title: Project Ashe/Ekko/Katarina Border Question
body: I have a question that i need answered quick. If I have the icon for the project skin and have already combined the blueprint with 7 cores, can I wait until after the event to get the skin and still get the border? Need an answer soon.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, no. In order to get the First Strike loading border, you need to own both the Project icon and the Project Skin for that specific champ **before** the event ends. Check out our [PROJECT: DISRUPTION FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) for complete details on the event.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Sorry for reviving this thread, but I got a question: the PROJECT: Ashe loading border/skin card was _limited_, right?

I ask because I read now that people get it as well when buying the skin in the current Early sale.
http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/february-early-sales-24217-27217

http://imgur.com/a/Pt3ti

It is ofc. possible that the image is edited, but I don't see any reason why it would be.

_I'd check the FAQ you posted, but - after going through the hassle of verifying I'm not a robot - it tells me I'm not authorized to access that page..._

Reading the FAQ elsewhere, this is confusing AF! Does it really say it was enough to get the blue triangle/Ashe _icon_ by that date - and the skin card would still be included when unlocking the skin whenever wanted??

>"PERMANENTLY UNLOCK FIRST STRIKE BORDERS FOR PROJECT: ASHE BY OWNING THE SKIN AND CRAFTING THE PROJECT: ASHE FIRST STRIKE ICON BY 23:59 PT ON AUGUST 16."

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/08/project-disruption-ashe-ekko-katarina.html#4

----------------

Either tell me I'm wrong, ensure those who buys the skin now will not get the skin card, or refund me the 470 RP I paid too much under false pretences.
Can we remove the borders if we don't want them anymore?

I looked into this and it seems that the Icon and Border are tied together and there are no plans to allow toggling the border on or off. The only way to get the icon without the border would be to craft it after the PROJECT: DISRUPTION event ends.
I just bought Project Ashe and got the First Strike border (i did the blueprint things etc during the event last year)
